text: If a partner dies, the deceased partner's personal representative or other legal representative may exercise the rights of a transferee as provided in § 29-707.02 and, for the purposes of settling the estate, may exercise the rights of a current limited partner under § 29-703.04.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 704 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act). See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-707.04

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Transferable Interests and Rights of Transferees and Creditors.

heading.catch_text: Power of estate of deceased partner.
